name: Fair Play the Notion version
description: About this templateInspired by Eve Rodsky's book Fair Play book and deck, I built this Notion template.From the Author:“The Fair Play book delivers a time and anxiety saving system that offers couples a completely new way to divvy up their domestic responsibilities. It started with the “Sh*t I Do” spreadsheet – a list of all the invisible tasks it takes to run a home, but developed into a gamified system with four easy-to-follow rules, 100 household tasks, and a figurative card game you play wit
